data.title: JOHN MOMOH – Junior Achievement Nigeria
data.text:
JOHN MOMOH

Chairman, Channels Media Group

John Momoh, Chairman of Channels Media Group and CEO of Channels Television is a distinguished broadcast journalist with over four decades of experience. Before founding Channels TV in 1995, he served in various roles at Nigeria’s National Radio and Television Stations. Under his leadership, Channels TV has grown into a multi-million dollar media enterprise, defying initial skepticism. John Momoh, an alumnus of Harvard Business School and the Lagos Business School, has received numerous awards for his excellence in broadcasting and entrepreneurship. He is involved in various professional and philanthropic endeavors, serving on the boards of several organizations and receiving honorary doctorate degrees from four Nigerian universities.
